name: Galaxy Hero
description:
This game is an adapted version of the world renown arcade game: Galaga. You are a lone hero in a far away galaxy. Your sole purpose is to defend the galaxy from enemies.

Using triggers is a key function in this game. By attaching triggers to a 2D Box Collider it allowed each enemy to be destroyed by every bullet. Again in this game the getKeyDown function resurfaces and serves to move your hero from enemy fire.

Some of the other things that are included in the game play are:

- Player ship will be able to move left and right within the game space.

- Player actions will be reflected in animation of the player ship

- Player ship will shoot one type of projectile

- Enemies will fly in formation
